WorkItem.Description:
Time selection (Club:Durationpicker) limited to 6:00 AM - 11:30 PM.  (24 hour seams more flexible)
I changed it to support 24 hour in RC1 (still reviewing 1709).
 
Can manually add time and or text (i.e. test start time and test end time) 
If you type in 7 for start time and 12 for end time it defaults to 12:00 AM - 12:00AM as is would for all other invalid entries.
 
Concern: What if you don’t realize you have typed an invalid entry.  Unless you verify, you would not know your event time is 12AM-12AM.
 
Regards,
Hotaling

Comments.Message: I personally don't like the way the guys at Microsoft that wrote the starter kit did this. For the next version, I will take out those controls and use something like the AJAX Control Toolkit controls. Those are much nicer to work with.
